message: Not only Gavin Raeburn himself, but much of the senior team that made DiRT 1 & 2, and GRID.

Mr_V and I have been doing some digging and reckon those who are interest in future racing titles should keep an eye on them. They're mostly made out of Codies and Bizarre Creations developers! I excite!
Oooh thanks for the heads up. Will keep an eye on them :)
